customTypes: 自定义类型, 如: `{ "customType": "(customType) custom type description" }`
jiraPrefix: Jira 项目前缀, 仅在 [Enable Jira](#gitCommitMessage.enableJira) 启用时有效, 如: PROJECT-
jiraUrl: Jira URL, 仅在 [Enable Jira](#gitCommitMessage.enableJira) 启用时有效, 如: https://jira.sample.com/browse/
name: 名称
reporters:
报告人列表
- `name`: 报告人名字
- `email`: 报告人邮箱
- `picked`: 是否默认勾选

```json
[
  { "name": "Reporter", "email": "reporter@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reporters.name: 报告人名字
reviewers:
审阅人列表
- `name`: 审阅人名字
- `email`: 审阅人邮箱
- `picked`: 是否默认勾选

```json
[
  { "name": "Reviewer", "email": "reviewer@sample.com", "picked": true }
]
```
reviewers.name: 审阅人名字
signer.name: 提交人名字
template:
模板

[详细了解如何对配置文件进行配置](https://github.com/lar-ry/git-commit-message/blob/master/README.md)
